short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: See all your life in blocks every time you open a new tab - a reminder to focus on important things in your life.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All your life in blocks, where each block is either a year, a month or a week of your life. For more information, read a brilliant article, written by Tim Urban: https://waitbutwhy.com/2014/05/life-weeks.html
